term.title: isocoumarins

item.text: Isocoumarin (1H-isochromen-1-one) and its derivatives formed by substitution. [image: Not defined]

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1344 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)

term.citation: Citation: 'isocoumarins' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.I03267
